snippet: A new theatrical work that fuses Mr. Bukowski's poetry with Mr. Sondheim's music and lyrics is scheduled to open in November in Long Beach, Calif.
abstract: A new theatrical work that fuses Mr. Bukowski's poetry with Mr. Sondheim's music and lyrics is scheduled to open in November in Long Beach, Calif.

headline.main: Why a Bukowski-Sondheim Musical Makes Sense
headline.print_headline: Bukowski and Sondheim: Words and Music
